Title: Relates to enacting provisions for the execution of electronic wills
Summary: Enacts provisions for the execution of electronic wills including attestation, revocation and filing.
LawCode: Add Art 3 Part 6 §§3-6.1 - 3-6.9, amd §§1-2.19 & 3-2.1, EPT L; amd §307, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the estates, powers and trusts law and the state technology law, in relation to electronic wills
